cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.13.4.0)
project(CMAKE_TRY_COMPILE CUDA)
set(CMAKE_VERBOSE_MAKEFILE 1)
set(CMAKE_CUDA_FLAGS "")
set(CMAKE_CUDA_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CUDA_FLAGS} ${COMPILE_DEFINITIONS}")
set(CMAKE_CUDA_FLAGS_DEBUG "-g")
set(CMAKE_EXE_LINKER_FLAGS "")
set(CMAKE_EXE_LINKER_FLAGS "${CMAKE_EXE_LINKER_FLAGS} ${EXE_LINKER_FLAGS}")
include_directories(${INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES})
set(CMAKE_SUPPRESS_REGENERATION 1)
link_directories(${LINK_DIRECTORIES})
cmake_policy(SET CMP0065 NEW)
set(CMAKE_RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "/home/myazdani/cuda/playground/matrix_ops/build/CMakeFiles/CMakeTmp")
add_executable(cmTC_137ca "/home/myazdani/cuda/playground/matrix_ops/build/CMakeFiles/CMakeTmp/main.cu")
target_link_libraries(cmTC_137ca ${LINK_LIBRARIES})
